attributes.comment:
I have the following comments with regard to the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration
Services docket number USCIS-2006-0044. I feel that this document, which has
proposed fee increases for Adoption-Related Petitions, is doing a disservice to the
American people and mankind in general. Adoption is a wonderful thing, it unites
a needy child with a family that is ready to love and raise that child as if he/she
were their own. The adoption process is already expensive, in addition to lengthy.
Hiking up the costs will certainly not promote more adoptions, rather it may
decrease the number due to financial constraints. To think that the number of
children that get adopted may be reduced, by however many, due to the increase
in costs implemented by the U.S. government is an awful thought. Being a U.S.
citizen, I more and more find myself embarrassed by my government. The passing
of this document would certainly add to my frustrations.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Michael D. Donovan
